org.dellroad.stuff.spring

Class HibernateIsolationJpaDialect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.orm.jpa.DefaultJpaDialect
      • org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor.HibernateJpaDialect
        • org.dellroad.stuff.spring.HibernateIsolationJpaDialect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, PersistenceExceptionTranslator, JpaDialect

    public class HibernateIsolationJpaDialect
extends HibernateJpaDialect
    Hibernate JPA adapter that adds supports for setting a non-default transaction isolation level and adds a workaround for SPR-10815.

    The JPA specification, which is database technology agnostic, does not define a way to set SQL database isolation levels. This fixes the "Standard JPA does not support custom isolation levels - use a special JpaDialect" Spring exception that will otherwise occur.

    See Also:
    SPR-3812, Question on stackoverflow.com, SPR-10815, Serialized Form
